mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 SET T1.WK_CAN_RSON_CD = '20'
WHERE T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = (SELECT A.CST_SV_ASN_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ A INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ B ON A.CST_SV_ASN_NO = B.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND B.IN_CHNL_DV_CD = '1' WHERE B.AS_IST_OJ_NO = #{asIstOjNo} )
